The elite '' Masters of War '' that have held, by force, positions of political, religious and economic power throughout our known history from Sumeria, Babylon, Egypt and Rome, up to the present-day covert ''World Management Team,'' are the Illuminati hybrid “Sleeper Races.” The Illuminati hybrid Sleeper Races are the Earthly representatives of competing Anunnaki, Necromiton and Drakonian/Reptilian Fallen Angelic legions, and they have been the motivating force behind literally all “human” politics since the 9558 BC “fall” of Atlantis. Illuminati hybrid Sleepers are but a minority within Earth populations, but they are those presently in positions of greatest power and inﬂuence behind the global political, religious and economic infrastructure. Like Earth’s Human races, Illuminati Sleeper races have been subjected to literally thousands of years of false cultural and religious programming via implanted Anunnaki and Drakonian/Reptilian indoctrination.
